title: Aqours Live Day 1!
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Haaa~.....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Hey, Chika-chan is falling asleep!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>She hasn’t even dried her hair yet.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I don’t want to wake her up. Should we dry her hair for her?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>You all sure love Chika-chi~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Shh! You’re being too loud, Mari!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Oh, right......!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Chika-chan was practicing up until it was time for her to shower. She must be tired.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>She got even more pumped up after getting messages from μ’s and Nijigaku.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>I finished prepping the futon for everyone, zura.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I’ll carry her over once her hair is dry.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Hey, Ruby is also starting to doze off.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Ruby, are you okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>I’m okay! I just worked super hard to build up my strength!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>......Maru is also at her limit, zura~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Yawn......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Let’s all get a good night’s sleep and get ready for the live concert!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Oooo~......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Chika-chan is responding......!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
